People ask over and over how to find a saturated pool.  Use  https://t.co/MkOkzofrfo and check the column labeled Pool Size. If the size is higher than 1% the pool is saturated. You will get less reward when delegating $ada to the pool.  Updated article:  https://t.co/lQnOY9thds

Currently, there are ~9,600,000,000 staked $ada in the #Cardano test-net and the desired number of pools is 100.  Saturation-point ≥ 9,600,000,000 / 100  A pool gets saturated when exceeds ~96,000,000 staked coins. It changes in every epoch as total staked ada coins change.  https://t.co/oaDc9pQELb
